data.text: @TTChelps Masks don't do squat besides they are all coming off soon. Also the TTC needs to start concentrating on fixing the delays. Never mind about the masks.
@CHRISMC39199344 @TTChelps It's illegal to enforce idiot ppl have breathing issues. If u wearing urs u fine
@KatMullaly @TTChelps Brainwashed idiot.  You're masked u protected
@TTChelps Too bad the ttc doesnt enforce it
@TTChelps Better still, ditch the mask and avoid the TTC.

@TTChelps Were that wishing made it so. (And I'm with you on this!) Growing mask non-compliance on TTC, and noses out on a huge chunk more. And all of that will only speed to full non-compliance in the days ahead. Apparently boredom, and minor effort required to mask, solves pandemics. 🙄
@glth9999 Far left ? Not even close. This coming from an account user who has to hide themselves. Immature ? 😁 coming from a user who has spent the last few hours copy & pasting

@FelixT2021 Found the childish and immature far left loser. 
Only immature children use animated GIFs.
@TTChelps We don't need masks on TTC buses, remember the windows are open for fresh air. LOL
